decks.notes: The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and reanimating them to gain a strategic advantage over the opponent. It utilizes a combination of counter spells, disruption, and card draw to protect its combo pieces and ensure a successful reanimation strategy. The deck aims to outpace the opponent and overwhelm them with powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, while controlling the game with cards like Thoughtseize and Force of Will. It combines elements of control and combo to create a versatile and powerful playstyle.

The deck focuses on utilizing cheap spells and efficient creatures to apply early pressure on the opponent while disrupting their game plan with counterspells. It aims to control the board with versatile threats like Murktide Regent and Dragon's Rage Channeler while also providing card advantage with cards like Mishra's Bauble and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student. By utilizing a mix of burn spells, disruptive counterspells, and efficient creatures, the deck aims to establish a dominant board presence and quickly close out the game before the opponent can stabilize.

The deck focuses on cheating out big threats like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Atraxa, Grand Unifier by using Show and Tell and Sneak Attack. The deck also includes ways to protect these threats with cards like Force of Will and Spell Pierce. The deck aims to quickly deploy its threats and overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to properly respond. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Stock Up and Brainstorm help dig for key pieces of the combo while also providing some card advantage.

The deck focuses on utilizing a combination of control elements such as counter spells, removal, and card advantage to disrupt the opponent's game plan while setting up its own win condition. It aims to control the game through cards like Force of Will, Thoughtseize, and Fatal Push, while also generating card advantage with cards like Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student. The deck also has the ability to stabilize the board with cards like Murktide Regent and close out the game with powerful threats like Rakshasa's Bargain.

This deck focuses on assembling the Painter's Servant and Grindstone combo, allowing the player to mill their opponent's entire deck in one turn. The deck includes various ways to tutor for the combo pieces, protect the combo with counterspells, and disrupt the opponent's game plan with removal and hate cards like Ensnaring Bridge. The deck aims to quickly assemble the combo while managing the opponent's threats and disrupting their game plan to win the game efficiently.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly and aggressively deal damage to the opponent while maintaining control with counter spells and disruptive abilities. By playing efficient creatures like Delver of Secrets, Dragon's Rage Channeler, and Murktide Regent, alongside powerful burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Unholy Heat, the deck aims to pressure the opponent and close out games quickly. The deck also utilizes cards like Daze, Force of Will, and Wasteland to disrupt the opponent's game plan and protect its own threats, making it a formidable Aggro deck in the Legacy format.

This deck focuses on utilizing disruptive creatures like Meddling Mage and Thalia, Guardian of Thraben to slow down the opponent, while also using powerful equipment like Sword of Fire and Ice to deal damage. It includes a side companion, Yorion, Sky Nomad, for additional value and card advantage. The deck also features cards like Stoneforge Mystic to search for equipment and Aether Vial to cheat creatures into play. With a mix of aggro strategies and disruptive elements, this deck aims to control the game and outpace the opponent.
